content.data: The  ManageIT .accdb file stores all the data for the xCRM mutliplier.The following is the breakdown of the tables and their fields:
This Table stores the Account Logs.

rows: A unique number used to reference the Account Log.
The User that created the entry.

content.data: A unique number used to reference the Account Log.
The User that created the entry.
This Table stores general information about the Accounts.

rows: A unique number used to reference the Account.

The Account Category: 
 1 = Customer 
 2 = Vendor 
 3 = Contractor 
 4 = User 
 5 = Project

content.data: A unique number used to reference the Account.
This Table stores general information about Alternate Phones.

rows: A unique number used to reference the Alternate Phones.
The Name for the Alternate Phone.

content.data: A unique number used to reference the Alternate Phones.
The Name for the Alternate Phone.
This Table stores general information about the Contacts.

rows: A unique number used to reference the Contact.
The Contact's Address is the same as the Account's Address.

content.data: A unique number used to reference the Contact.
The Contact's Address is the same as the Account's Address.
This Table stores general information about this Database.

rows: A number indicating the version of this Database. The Database Version changes each time fields are added/removed from the Database.

content.data: A number indicating the version of this Database. The Database Version changes each time fields are added/removed from the Database.
This Table stores the Default Properties for records stored in this Database.

rows: A unique number used to reference the Default Properties.

The Account Category: 
 1 = Customer 
 2 = Vendor 
 3 = Contractor 
 4 = User 
 5 = Project

The Property Category: 
 0 = Text 
 1 = Currency 
 2 = Integer 
 3 = Single 
 4 = Measure 
 5 = Yes/No 
 6 = List 
 8 = Filename
12 character code for system properties. Default is PRP_USER
Boolean representing if the Property is Locked.

content.data: A unique number used to reference the Default Properties.
12 character code for system properties. Default is PRP_USER
Boolean representing if the Property is Locked.
This Table stores general information about Default Tasks.

rows: A unique number used to reference the Default Task.

The Account Category: 
 1 = Customer 
            2 = Vendor 
            3 = Contractor 
            4 = User 
 5 = Project
12 character code for system tasks. Default is TSK_USER
Boolean representing if the hours are Billable.

content.data: A unique number used to reference the Default Task.
12 character code for system tasks. Default is TSK_USER
Boolean representing if the hours are Billable.
This Table stores general information about the Jobs.

rows: A unique number used to reference the Job.

The Check Out Status for the Job: 
            1 = New 
            2 = Checked-out 
            3 = Checked-in
AccountID of job creator or whoever last checked it out.
Date the Job was Last Modified.

content.data: A unique number used to reference the Job.

The Check Out Status for the Job: 
            1 = New 
            2 = Checked-out 
            3 = Checked-in
AccountID of job creator or whoever last checked it out.
Date the Job was Last Modified.
This Table stores general information about the Job Versions.

rows: A unique number used to reference the Version of the Job.
Repository Name for Zipfile ex. TestJob_030501110000
Date the Version was Last Checked Out.

content.data: A unique number used to reference the Version of the Job.
Repository Name for Zipfile ex. TestJob_030501110000
Date the Version was Last Checked Out.
This Table stores general information about the Project Information.

rows: A cross-reference to the Customers [Accounts].[AccountID] field.
Boolean representing if the Project has been Completed.

content.data: A cross-reference to the Customers [Accounts].[AccountID] field.
Boolean representing if the Project has been Completed.
This Table stores general Property information.

rows: A unique number used to reference the Property.
Boolean representing if the Property is Locked.

content.data: A unique number used to reference the Property.
Boolean representing if the Property is Locked.
This Table stores general information about the Reports.

rows: A unique number used to reference the Report.

The Account Category the Report is available for. 
            1 = Customer 
            2 = Vendor 
            3 = Contractor 
            4 = User 
            5 = Project 
            6 = Task

content.data: A unique number used to reference the Report.

The Account Category the Report is available for. 
            1 = Customer 
            2 = Vendor 
            3 = Contractor 
            4 = User 
            5 = Project 
            6 = Task
This Table stores general information about Resources.

rows: A unique number used to reference the Resource.

content.data: A unique number used to reference the Resource.
This Table stores general information about the Status.

rows: A unique number used to reference the Status.

The Category where the Status is located. 
            1 = Customer 
            2 = Vendor 
            3 = Contractor 
            4 = User 
            5 = Project 
            6 = Task

content.data: A unique number used to reference the Status.

The Category where the Status is located. 
            1 = Customer 
            2 = Vendor 
            3 = Contractor 
            4 = User 
            5 = Project 
            6 = Task
This Table stores general information about Tasks.

rows: A unique number used to reference the Task.

Currently only projects. 
            1 = Customer 
            2 = Vendor 
            3 = Contractor 
 4 = User 
 5 = Project
Secondary Link to a related account. Use determined by SystemName.
12 character code for system tasks. Default is TSK_USER
Boolean representing if the Task has been Completed.

content.data: A unique number used to reference the Task.

Currently only projects. 
            1 = Customer 
            2 = Vendor 
            3 = Contractor
Secondary Link to a related account. Use determined by SystemName.
12 character code for system tasks. Default is TSK_USER
Boolean representing if the Task has been Completed.
This Table stores general information about the Type of Accounts.

rows: A unique number used to reference the record Type.

Represents the record Type: 
            1 = Customer 
            2 = Vendor 
            3 = Contractor 
            4 = User 
            5 = Project 
            6 = Task

content.data: A unique number used to reference the record Type.

Represents the record Type: 
            1 = Customer 
            2 = Vendor 
            3 = Contractor 
            4 = User 
            5 = Project 
            6 = Task
